edu.luc.cs.trull.task
Interface Task

All Known Implementing Classes:
Count, ProgressTask, RunnableTask, Timer
public interface Task

An abstraction of a piece of work that can be broken up into discrete steps. A Task is usually performed by a Worker. The granularity of the steps is up to the implementor of the Task and determines the granularity of control over the Worker executing the Task.

See Also:
AbstractTaskWorker

Method Summary
 boolean hasNext()
          Returns true if the task is still in progress.
 java.lang.Object next()
          Performs the next discrete step of this task.
 void restart()
          Reinitializes this task so that it can be performed again.
